org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.hardware.controller

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.hardware.controller.Button
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StepButton

    public class Button
extends java.lang.Object
    The Button class represents a button on the gamepad and handles all the reactions done on the gamepad.
